other_tests.findings: Detected Borrelia miyamotoi in the peripheral blood of both patients. No evidence of infection with other tickborne pathogens commonly diagnosed in the referral areas.
Negative for IgM, IgA, and IgG isotypes for B. burgdorferi in acute serum. Negative serology for A. phagocytophilum and E. chaffeensis. Convalescent tests were also negative for these pathogens.
Negative for B. microti or A. phagocytophilum.
